title: Super Easy No-Bake Pumpkin Pie Filling / Dip
description: A quick, no-bake pumpkin pie filling or dip that's great as a pie filling, pastry filling, or served as a cookie dip. Comes together in under 10 minutes and is served chilled or at room temperature.
yield: About 3 cups (roughly 6–8 servings, depending on portion size)

ingredients.name: canned pure pumpkin (or homemade)
ingredients.notes: not pumpkin pie filling — pure pumpkin

ingredients.name: whipped topping
ingredients.notes: one 8-oz tub (e.g., thawed Cool Whip or similar)

steps.title: Prepare cream cheese
steps.instruction: Ensure the cream cheese is softened to room temperature so it blends smoothly. If it's still firm, soften briefly in the microwave in 5–10 second intervals.
steps.notes: If not softened, small chunks of cream cheese may remain in the final mixture; flavor will be fine but texture less smooth.

steps.title: Combine ingredients
steps.instruction: Add the softened cream cheese, vanilla extract, canned pumpkin, whipped topping, ground cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, and powdered sugar to a large bowl.
steps.notes: Use a mixer to beat until well combined and smooth. Scrape the bowl with a spatula to ensure even mixing.

steps.title: Finish and serve
steps.instruction: Transfer to a serving bowl or use as a filling. Serve as a dip with cookies, spoon into a no-bake pie crust for a quick pumpkin pie, or use as a pastry/cream filling for eclairs, donuts, or cream puffs.
steps.notes: Top with additional whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon if desired. Chill briefly if you prefer it cold, but serving at room temperature is fine.

uses: Dip for cookies or graham crackers
Filling for cream puffs, eclairs, or donuts
Serve in a bowl topped with whipped cream
notes.storage: Store covered in the refrigerator up to 3–4 days.
tips: Do not confuse canned pure pumpkin with pumpkin pie filling (the latter is sweetened and spiced already).
For a firmer filling, fold less whipped topping or chill for 30–60 minutes before using in a pie.
